extract.description: extracts SharedStreets streets using polygon boundary and returns GeoJSON output of all intersecting features
examples:
$ shst intersects polygon.geojson --out=output.geojson
  üåè Loading polygon...
  üóÑÔ∏è Loading SharedStreets tiles...
  üîç Searching data...

match.description: matches point and line features to sharedstreets refs
examples:
$ shst match points.geojson --out=matched_points.geojson --port-properties
  üåè  Loading points...
  ‚ú®  Matching 3 points...
  üéâ  Matched 2 points... (1 unmached)

out.name: out
out.description: file output name creates files [file-output-name].matched.geojson and [file-output-name].unmatched.geojson

skip-port-properties.name: skip-port-properties
skip-port-properties.description: skip porting existing feature properties preceeded by "pp_"

best-direction.name: best-direction
best-direction.description: only match one direction based on best score

direction-field.name: direction-field
direction-field.description: name of optional line properity describing segment directionality, use the related "one-way-*-value" and "two-way-value" properties

one-way-with-direction-value.name: one-way-with-direction-value
one-way-with-direction-value.description: name of optional value of "direction-field" indicating a one-way street with line direction

one-way-against-direction-value.name: one-way-against-direction-value
one-way-against-direction-value.description: name of optional value of "direction-field" indicating a one-way street against line direction

two-way-value.name: two-way-value
two-way-value.description: name of optional value of "direction-field" indicating a two-way street

bearing-field.name: bearing-field
bearing-field.description: name of optional point property containing bearing in decimal degrees

search-radius.name: search-radius
search-radius.description: search radius for for snapping points, lines and traces (in meters)

snap-intersections.name: snap-intersections
snap-intersections.description: snap line end-points to nearest intersection

snap-side-of-street.name: snap-side-of-street
snap-side-of-street.description: snap line to side of street

left-side-driving.name: left-side-driving
left-side-driving.description: snap line to side of street

match-surface-streets-only.name: match-surface-streets-only
match-surface-streets-only.description: only match against surface street segments

offset-line.name: offset-line
offset-line.description: offset geometry based on direction of matched line (in meters)

cluster-points.name: cluster-points
cluster-points.description: sub-segment length for clustering points (in meters)
